text: The Joffrey Tower is a high-rise commercial real estate development on the northeast corner of North State Street and East Randolph Street in the Loop community area of Chicago in Cook County, Illinois, United States. It is the permanent home of the Joffrey Ballet. ==References== ==Other websites== *Joffrey Tower Condominium Sales & Rental Website *Emporis.com *Smithfield Website Category:Skyscrapers in Chicago Category:2008 establishments in the United States Category:2000s establishments in Illinois
title: Joffrey Tower
